GlossEntry.GlossDef: The newer German Rules (replacing the Preußischen Instruktionen), developed around 1970 under the marked influence of the ISBD. There are two sets of fundamental rules, RAK-ÖB and RAK-WB, for the public and academic libraries, resp. together with special rules (sometimes quite inconsistent) developed over the years for non-book materials etc.
A secondary copy of a manifestation.

A note that contains information about a reproduction -- pertains to a holding record.
MARC XXXX cf. dicussion there.
